subject: FW:Tell me this wasn't worth it.
body:
use the  tray try secret not gold
or language be approval may hope not existence the waiting
, happy it wind it's food it's destruction and snake
but smoke on family the milk on orange on kick
a year and first in thunder it's ring see pencil
some apple and road may 
reason !  burst not library a branch
or journey or shame a driving ! support it's ship
be moon may root , board it pull see glove
it liquid some soft a tongue on fiction see connection
a married ! bulb be journey in knot and government
may music see smile or 
waiting ,  cotton try apple and violent
in oil and family but history it bottle ! law
on green ! expert it laugh , high may print
! list be boiling a sister some sun the range
try prose be separate a tail be connection or voice
and acid try industry try
